name: Dissolve Shader Defold
description:
( Click to dissolve between the characters ghost state )

Created using DEFOLD ( https://defold.com/ )

 Dissolving effect shader made in Defold. Effect was created using an offset technique to a noise texture in the same atlas as the character.

This is the result of my learning experiments with the Defold game engine. For demonstration purposes. Sample project can be found on github.

https://github.com/FlexYourBrain/Delab2D_dissolve
